t: This{H2088} is the book{H5612} of the generations{H8435} of Adam{H121}. In the day{H3117} that God{H430} created{H1254}{(H8800)} man{H120}, in the likeness{H1823} of God{H430} made{H6213}{(H8804)} he him;

Male{H2145} and female{H5347} created{H1254}{(H8804)} he them; and blessed{H1288}{(H8762)} them, and called{H7121}{(H8799)} their name{H8034} Adam{H120}, in the day{H3117} when they were created{H1254}{(H8736)}.

And Adam{H121} lived{H2421}{(H8799)} an hundred{H3967} and thirty{H7970} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205}{(H8686)} a son in his own likeness{H1823}, after his image{H6754}; and called{H7121}{(H8799)} his name{H8034} Seth{H8352}:
c: {'ref': '1 Corinthians 15:49', 'note': 'Image of the earthy vs. heavenly'}

t: And the days{H3117} of Adam{H121} after{H310} he had begotten{H3205}{(H8687)} Seth{H8352} were eight{H8083} hundred{H3967} years{H8141}: and he begat{H3205}{(H8686)} sons{H1121} and daughters{H1323}:
And all the days{H3117} that Adam{H121} lived{H2425}{(H8804)} were nine{H8672} hundred{H3967}{H8141} and thirty{H7970} years{H8141}: and he died{H4191}{(H8799)}.
And Seth{H8352} lived{H2421}{(H8799)} an hundred{H3967}{H8141} and five{H2568} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205}{(H8686)} Enos{H583}:
c: {'ref': 'Genesis 4:26', 'note': 'Enos and calling on the name of the LORD'}

t: And Seth{H8352} lived{H2421}{(H8799)} after{H310} he begat{H3205}{(H8687)} Enos{H583} eight{H8083} hundred{H3967}{H8141} and seven{H7651} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205}{(H8686)} sons{H1121} and daughters{H1323}:
And all the days{H3117} of Seth{H8352} were nine{H8672} hundred{H3967}{H8141} and twelve{H6240}{H8147} years{H8141}: and he died{H4191}{(H8799)}.
And Enos{H583} lived{H2421}{(H8799)} ninety{H8673} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205}{(H8686)} Cainan{H7018}:
c: {'ref': '1 Chronicles 1:2', 'note': 'Enosh and Kenan in the genealogy'}

t: And Enos{H583} lived{H2421}{(H8799)} after{H310} he begat{H3205}{(H8687)} Cainan{H7018} eight{H8083} hundred{H3967}{H8141} and fifteen{H6240}{H2568} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205}{(H8686)} sons{H1121} and daughters{H1323}:
And all the days{H3117} of Enos{H583} were nine{H8672} hundred{H3967}{H8141} and five{H2568} years{H8141}: and he died{H4191}{(H8799)}.
And Cainan{H7018} lived{H2421}{(H8799)} seventy{H7657} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205}{(H8686)} Mahalaleel{H4111}:

And Cainan{H7018} lived{H2421}{(H8799)} after{H310} he begat{H3205}{(H8687)} Mahalaleel{H4111} eight{H8083} hundred{H3967}{H8141} and forty{H705} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205}{(H8686)} sons{H1121} and daughters{H1323}:
And all the days{H3117} of Cainan{H7018} were nine{H8672} hundred{H3967}{H8141} and ten{H6235} years{H8141}: and he died{H4191}{(H8799)}.
And Mahalaleel{H4111} lived{H2421}{(H8799)} sixty{H8346}{H8141} and five{H2568} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205}{(H8686)} Jared{H3382}:

And Mahalaleel{H4111} lived{H2421}{(H8799)} after{H310} he begat{H3205}{(H8687)} Jared{H3382} eight{H8083} hundred{H3967}{H8141} and thirty{H7970} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205}{(H8686)} sons{H1121} and daughters{H1323}:
And all the days{H3117} of Mahalaleel{H4111} were eight{H8083} hundred{H3967}{H8141} ninety{H8673} and five{H2568} years{H8141}: and he died{H4191}{(H8799)}.
And Jared{H3382} lived{H2421}{(H8799)} an hundred{H3967} sixty{H8346}{H8141} and two{H8147} years{H8141}, and he begat{H3205}{(H8686)} Enoch{H2585}:
And Jared{H3382} lived{H2421}{(H8799)} after{H310} he begat{H3205}{(H8687)} Enoch{H2585} eight{H8083} hundred{H3967} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205}{(H8686)} sons{H1121} and daughters{H1323}:
And all the days{H3117} of Jared{H3382} were nine{H8672} hundred{H3967}{H8141} sixty{H8346} and two{H8147} years{H8141}: and he died{H4191}{(H8799)}.
And Enoch{H2585} lived{H2421}{(H8799)} sixty{H8346} and five{H2568} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205}{(H8686)} Methuselah{H4968}:
c: {'ref': 'Hebrews 11:5', 'note': 'Enoch translated that he should not see death'}

t: And Enoch{H2585} walked{H1980}{(H8691)} with{H854} God{H430} after{H310} he begat{H3205}{(H8687)}{H853} Methuselah{H4968} three{H7969} hundred{H3967} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205}{(H8686)} sons{H1121} and daughters{H1323}:
c: {'ref': 'Amos 3:3', 'note': 'Can two walk together, except they be agreed?'}

t: And all the days{H3117} of Enoch{H2585} were three{H7969} hundred{H3967}{H8141} sixty{H8346} and five{H2568} years{H8141}:
And Enoch{H2585} walked{H1980}{(H8691)} with God{H430}: and he was not; for God{H430} took{H3947}{(H8804)} him.
c: {'ref': 'Hebrews 11:5', 'note': 'He was not found, because God had translated him'}
{'ref': '2 Kings 2:11', 'note': 'Elijah taken up into heaven (parallel theme)'}

t: And Methuselah{H4968} lived{H2421}{(H8799)} an hundred{H3967}{H8141} eighty{H8084} and seven{H7651} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205}{(H8686)} Lamech{H3929}:

And all the days{H3117} of Methuselah{H4968} were nine{H8672} hundred{H3967}{H8141} sixty{H8346} and nine{H8672} years{H8141}: and he died{H4191}{(H8799)}.
And Lamech{H3929} lived{H2421}{(H8799)} an hundred{H3967}{H8141} eighty{H8084} and two{H8147} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205}{(H8686)} a son{H1121}:

And he called{H7121}{(H8799)} his name{H8034} Noah{H5146}, saying{H559}{(H8800)}, This same shall comfort{H5162}{(H8762)} us concerning our work{H4639} and toil{H6093} of our hands{H3027}, because{H4480} of the ground{H127} which the LORD{H3068} hath cursed{H779}{(H8765)}.
c: {'ref': 'Genesis 8:21', 'note': 'Curse on the ground eased after the flood'}

t: And Lamech{H3929} lived{H2421}{(H8799)} after{H310} he begat{H3205}{(H8687)} Noah{H5146} five{H2568} hundred{H3967}{H8141} ninety{H8673} and five{H2568} years{H8141}, and begat{H3205}{(H8686)} sons{H1121} and daughters{H1323}:
And all the days{H3117} of Lamech{H3929} were seven{H7651} hundred{H3967}{H8141} seventy{H7657} and seven{H7651} years{H8141}: and he died{H4191}{(H8799)}.
And Noah{H5146} was five{H2568} hundred{H3967} years{H8141} old{H1121}: and Noah{H5146} begat{H3205}{(H8686)} Shem{H8035}, Ham{H2526}, and Japheth{H3315}.
